title: Correntes de Lava
body:
At Pôrto do Moniz, on the northern coast of Madeira, and at Gorgulho, near Funchal, there are very curious-looking lava flows. The flows at Pôrto do Moniz, which are depicted in a drawing in Carlos Lyell's Elements of Geology, have a particularly recent appearance, with one of them forming a rugged mass that extends beyond the coastline. The lava at Gorgulho is on the coast, near the site where a small fort once stood, and it has several excavations where seawater is deposited.

> Correntes Maritimas. V. Gulf Stream.

Pôrto do Moniz: On the northern coast of Madeira
